descriptions.text: Vin is a wary street orphan surviving in Luthadel’s criminal underworld, unsure why odd strokes of 'luck' seem to follow her.
Vin, still the wary street orphan, is beginning to trust Kelsier and his crew while struggling to understand her strange abilities.
Vin, the street orphan learning she is more than she believed, is growing into her role within Kelsier’s crew as she uncovers her powers.
Vin, the former street orphan turned powerful Mistborn, has become central to the rebellion and the fate of the empire.
Kelsier is a daring, charismatic man with a mischievous grin, famed for surviving the impossible Pits of Hathsin.
Kelsier, the survivor of the Pits, continues leading the rebellion with charm and boldness.
Kelsier, the daring leader and Survivor of Hathsin, inspires hope and defiance among the skaa.
Kelsier, the Survivor and mastermind of the rebellion, has become a legend in his own time.
Elend Venture is a thoughtful young nobleman more interested in books than noble politics.
Elend, the bookish nobleman, continues to stand out from his peers with his curiosity.
Elend, the idealistic nobleman, begins to question his world more openly.
Elend, still the nobleman with a love for books, grows into someone whose choices matter greatly.
Sazed is a calm, soft-spoken Terris Keeper, a scholar devoted to preserving forgotten knowledge.
Sazed, the patient Terris Keeper, continues to advise the crew with his vast knowledge.
Sazed, the wise Terris Keeper and scholar, becomes a trusted guide in navigating the empire’s mysteries.
Sazed, always the Terris Keeper, remains a source of wisdom and history as events reach their climax.
Breeze is a refined, witty man who uses his Soothing abilities and charm to sway emotions.
Breeze, the smooth Soother, lightens tense moments with wit and subtle manipulation.
Breeze, ever the charming Soother, steadies the crew with calm words and careful influence.
Breeze, the clever Soother, remains a source of levity and subtle guidance.
Clubs is a gruff carpenter and Smoker who shields the crew’s hideouts from detection.
Clubs, the practical Smoker, provides a safe base and steady support.
Clubs, ever the gruff Smoker, keeps the crew hidden and safe.
Clubs, the loyal Smoker and craftsman, continues to protect the rebellion from the shadows.
Spook is the youngest member of Kelsier’s crew, eager to prove his worth.
Spook, the youthful Tineye, continues to learn from the older crew members.
Spook, still the young crew member, grows more confident in his role.
Spook, the eager Tineye, remains a spark of youthful energy in the rebellion.
Dockson is Kelsier’s organized and reliable right hand, managing the rebellion’s logistics.
Dockson, ever the planner, keeps the crew focused and the rebellion running smoothly.
Dockson, Kelsier’s dependable lieutenant, remains essential to holding the plan together.
Dockson, the loyal organizer, continues to ensure the rebellion’s efforts stay on track.
Ham is a friendly, muscular man and Thug who loves to debate philosophy as much as he likes to fight.
Ham, the philosophical Thug, continues to mix thoughtful questions with dependable strength.
Ham, the thoughtful Thug, balances might with musings that ground the crew.
Ham, always the Thug and philosopher, remains a steady and loyal friend.
Marsh is Kelsier’s serious older brother, quiet and driven by a sense of duty.
Marsh, the somber brother, takes on dangerous work for the rebellion.
Marsh, Kelsier’s devoted brother, remains an enigmatic and dedicated ally.
Marsh, always the dutiful brother, becomes a figure of mystery and sacrifice.
The Lord Ruler is the distant, absolute ruler of the Final Empire, worshipped and feared as immortal.
The Lord Ruler, ever-present in power, remains an untouchable figure of awe and terror.
The Lord Ruler, the seemingly immortal tyrant, casts a shadow over every corner of the empire.
The Lord Ruler, the godlike ruler of the Final Empire, stands as the ultimate obstacle to change.
Straff Venture is a powerful, ambitious nobleman leading House Venture.
Straff, the ruthless Venture patriarch, maneuvers for advantage.
Straff, the scheming nobleman, pushes his influence across the empire.
Straff, the unrelenting head of House Venture, remains a threat to all opposing him.
Reen is Vin’s older brother, the one voice from her past that still echoes in her mind.
Reen, the protective but harsh brother, remains a shadow in Vin’s thoughts.
Reen, Vin’s absent brother, lingers in her memories and warnings.
Reen, the brother who shaped Vin’s wary nature, continues to influence her from afar.
Kar is a brutish Inquisitor, feared for his ruthless efficiency.
Kar, the brutish Inquisitor, becomes an increasingly intimidating presence.
Kar, still the feared Inquisitor, grows more relentless in his pursuit of the crew.
Kar, the unyielding Inquisitor, looms as a symbol of the Lord Ruler’s terrifying power.
Captain Demoux is a loyal soldier, committed to serving the rebellion with honor.
Captain Demoux, the loyal soldier, begins to take on more responsibility in the field.
Captain Demoux, always steadfast, emerges as an important leader among the ranks.
Captain Demoux, the dependable soldier, proves himself crucial as the rebellion faces its greatest challenges.
Lord Venture is the calculating head of House Venture, driven by power and influence.
Lord Venture, the calculating nobleman, maneuvers politically as tensions rise.
Lord Venture, the head of House Venture, becomes more aggressive in securing his family’s dominance.
Lord Venture, the ambitious patriarch, exerts his influence with even greater ruthlessness.
Yeden is a determined rebel leader desperate to see the skaa rise against the empire.
Yeden, the passionate rebel, pushes the rebellion forward with fervor.
Yeden, always the determined leader, struggles to balance hope with reality.
Yeden, the unwavering rebel leader, faces the consequences of his ambitions.

recaps.Prologue: A skaa worker toils under ash‑filled skies, while a mysterious stranger hints that change may be coming.
recaps.1: Vin, a wary street thief, survives among an abusive crew by staying unnoticed.
recaps.2: A powerful stranger named Kelsier appears, shaking up Vin’s crew with bold promises.
recaps.3: Kelsier shows uncanny abilities, leaving Vin uneasy but intrigued.
recaps.4: Vin senses a strange luck‑like power she doesn’t understand as she watches Kelsier’s daring.
recaps.5: Kelsier confronts a corrupt nobleman, leaving Vin stunned by his confidence.
recaps.6: Kelsier begins to pull Vin into his plans, offering her a glimpse of another life.
recaps.7: Vin struggles with her mistrust as she witnesses Kelsier’s crew come together.
recaps.8: The crew discusses an impossible plan: to rob the Lord Ruler himself.
recaps.9: Vin cautiously steps into Kelsier’s world, learning she may have more potential than she imagined.
recaps.10: Vin begins training under Kelsier, unsure of what she’s gotten herself into.
recaps.11: The crew’s lofty plan takes shape, though Vin is still unsure where she fits.
recaps.12: Vin is pushed to learn skills she didn’t know existed, forcing her to trust cautiously.
recaps.13: Kelsier’s teachings and daring inspire Vin, though she questions his motives.
recaps.14: Vin sees firsthand the brutality of noble society from a different angle.
recaps.15: The crew continues preparations as Vin slowly learns to trust her new allies.
recaps.16: Vin’s abilities grow, and the weight of the mission becomes clearer.
recaps.17: Vin attends a noble gathering, stepping into a world entirely foreign to her.
recaps.18: The lines between noble politeness and hidden cruelty begin to show.
recaps.19: Vin continues her undercover work, struggling with dual identities.
recaps.20: The crew gathers intelligence while Kelsier keeps secrets close.
recaps.21: Kelsier’s daring raids unsettle the nobility and inspire whispers of rebellion.
recaps.22: Vin observes how different parts of the city respond to Kelsier’s actions.
recaps.23: A growing sense of danger hangs over the crew’s every move.
recaps.24: Vin finds herself drawn to unexpected connections at the balls she attends.
recaps.25: The stakes rise as Kelsier’s plans clash with harsh realities.
recaps.26: Kelsier’s crew faces setbacks, forcing them to adjust their strategy.
recaps.27: Vin continues her careful balancing act between two dangerous worlds.
recaps.28: Kelsier’s boldness escalates, leaving even his friends uneasy.
recaps.29: Tensions within the crew come to the surface as pressure mounts.
recaps.30: Vin faces challenges that test her trust and her growing skills.
recaps.31: The rebellion’s hopes teeter on Kelsier’s increasingly audacious moves.
recaps.32: Vin witnesses consequences that shake her faith in the plan.
recaps.33: The city reacts to shocking events, and nothing feels certain.
recaps.34: The crew regroups as their mission nears its breaking point.
recaps.35: Vin steels herself for choices she never imagined making.
recaps.36: Confrontations come to a head as truths surface.
recaps.37: The city holds its breath as fates are decided.
recaps.38: The aftermath reshapes lives, leaving questions and hope behind.
recaps.Epilogue: A quiet moment suggests that change has only just begun.
